sect2.title: Starting KDE Plasma 5 from the command line
sect2.para: To start KDE Plasma 5 from the command line, you first need to modify your .xinitrc file:

screen.userinput:
cat > ~/.xinitrc << EOF # Begin .xinitrc
exec ck-launch-session dbus-launch --exit-with-session startkde
# End .xinitrc EOF

tip.para: If you are having problems starting KDE Plasma 5, try replacing startkde with startkde-wrapper in the command above.

note.para: If you are not using ConsoleKit, remove ck-launch-session from the command above.

sect2.para: You can now start KDE Plasma 5 using the startx command.
